text:
"A Neighborhood Gem Since 2009"

I’ve been a regular customer at Lim Provision since 2009 but never took the time to leave a review until now. Mr. and Mrs. Lim have always been incredibly kind, making every visit a pleasant experience. Their shop consistently offers a wide range of basic necessities and groceries, perfect for everyday needs. In times of urgency, I’ve always found exactly what I needed here. Lim Provision is truly a cornerstone of the community, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for quality service and convenience.

A provision shop which sells many varieties of daily house hold goods and foodstuffs.It provides conveniency to the residents in this neighbourhood.
Dated : 17/01/2018 ( Wednesday ).
Always low in stock and yet the prices are unjustifiably inflating. Not recommended if you have low patience for incompetence.
The staffs are friendly and sell a lot of snacks, fruits and other groceries essentials.
Friendly staff , never ending  suppliesnof store items
